DOC.brief_summary: Comparative pharmacokinetics dipyridamole two new formulation Asasantin ER compare present commercial formulation
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Pharmacokinetics Dipyridamole Three Different Asasantin Extended Release ( ER ) Formulations Healthy Male Female Volunteers
